thread.title: Gossip Ellen Pompeo says Daniel Craig needs 'a reality check' after yesterday's self harm comments
thread.title_full: Gossip | Ellen Pompeo says Daniel Craig needs 'a reality check' after yesterday's self harm comments - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip Ellen Pompeo says Daniel Craig needs 'a reality check' after yesterday's self harm comments
text:
Yesterday, Daniel Craig reportedly said in an interview that he'd rather "slit his wrists" than star in another Bond movie. Unsurprisingly, said comments have not been received well.
Greys actress Ellen Pompeo posted the below to her twitter.
This dude needs a reality check https://t.co/adi4RYRXg3
— Ellen Pompeo (@EllenPompeo) October 8, 2015
It wasn't long before Ellen started receiving some minor backlash of her own, with one follower stating
You are absolutely right! I certainly have been there https://t.co/3vHte187Em
— Ellen Pompeo (@EllenPompeo) October 8, 2015
The Quote: from Time Out London reads: "I'd rather break this glass and slash my wrists... I'm over it at the moment. We’re done. All I want to do is move on."
Message received.
MORE: Watch: The final promo for Spectre drops and it looks phenomenal
MORE: Daniel Craig says he'd rather self-harm than do another Bond movie
